root.name: Super Dodge Ball Advance
root.description: The Game consists of 9 DodgeBall teams from all around the world. Each One is named after a Cultural stereotype based on their respective Countries. These Include:CountryTeam NameCanadaFoxesUSABravesEnglandKnightsHollandAngelsRussiaBearsChinaDragonsSouth KoreaBombersJapanNinjasAustraliaStarsHowever 3 "Dream Teams" can be unlocked by Completing the championship mode a set number of timesDream Team C "Iron Men"Dream Team B "the Rockets"Dream Team A "The Shooters"
